__e: At which point you knew it was time to confront Larry.
The money isn't why you came. You came because you knew it was right.
And you know he was hit in the face?
Did you know that the Pope has already made him a Saint?
Did you know the doctor was leaving Eichwald?
{\pos(110,268)}Did you{\* guys} know our{\* own} Michael Scott has made a movie and{\* that} he maybe will let us watch it, {\pos(120,268)}but only if everybody's dying to see it?

You chose to protect those people and stay alive, 'and you understood that that was a permanent decision.'
"My girlfriend used to be a boyfriend", that sort of thing.
Okay, so tell me, if your tracking device was so damn fantastic, how did you not know what was happening to this girl, huh?
[ Exhales sharply ] Well, if you didn't know, what are you doing here?
Have you ever had a dream that seemed so real, when you woke up you didn't know what to believe?
